Text: O cool. An animated rip off of warm bodies

Iceburgslim : Considering the story of this movie is based off of a comic book that was released by Dynamite Comics in 2007 and the fact that it has absolutely nothing in common with Warm Bodies story wise other than it having a Zombie in it, Maybe next time you can get your facts straight before you spout off nonsense about a topic you know nothing about. The Living Corpse makes Warm Bodies look like Sesame Street. Know your shit before you let it fall out of your mouth.
So its like Sesame Street with Zombies?  Because the first link kind of threw me.  Well Scene4All always does us right.

As the co creator of the comic book that this movie is based on, I hope that if you like the movie you'll go out and buy a copy to support us and make sure that more movies and comics are made!
And don't forget to check out The Living Corpse comic from Dynamite Entertainment!
Thanks!
-Ken
